entries: The relic surrounds you with a storm of wind, rain, and lightning in a 30-foot emanation. This storm is difficult terrain for creatures other than you. Any creature other than you that enters or starts its turn in the storm takes {@damage 1d12} electricity damage, with a basic Reflex save ({@damage 2d12} damage at 15th level). You can {@action sustain an activation||Sustain this Activation} up to 1 minute.
